title: Upscale Central Anshan Stay with Three Restaurants, Indoor Swimming Pool & Spa
description:
Experience the allure of Anshan, a city steeped in history and culture, with a stay at this luxurious Pullman property. Located in the heart of the city, moments from the celebrated Time Square, this hotel offers a sophisticated retreat amidst the city's vibrant energy. After a full day, unwind with a swim in the serene indoor pool or enjoy a rejuvenating treatment at the onsite spa.

Ideally located in north Anshan-just 15 minutes from the railway station and 10 minutes from the city centre-Pullman Anshan Time Square places you steps from shopping malls, supermarkets and the tranquil Mengtai Garden.
offer_address: No 306 Shengli Road, Lishan District, Anshan, 114030, China
